name: Hot Potato (itch)
description: Hot Potato is a Work In Progress game created by Dwyn. This game is about a lonely, friendless potato who wants to get the girl of his dreams, Sweet Potato. The problem is, Sweet Potato only dates hot potatoes. Ugly Potato is determined, and he goes on a journey to find the coolest things on the planet: The Shades of the Deep, The Blazing Leather Jacket, and the Cig of the City. On his journey, he must fight enemies like cooler potatoes, Irishmen, and other strange beings that you have yet to discover. Will you triumph and get the girl, or will you cower back into your tent in the woods?
